Name: Simulators2021
About the game: 'Simulators2021' is a simulation game that integrates all kinds of interesting types. Each map has its own method of playing, as well as fun eggs. And buy once to enjoy a permanent update game ontology content free. All kinds of simulation games let you have fun at one time. Game Features 路There are many game modes to choose from 路Real picture 路Independent plot of each mode 路Trigger multiple outcomes Maps Ready Bathing Simulator Thermometer Simulator Test Fruit Simulator Plan Blind Simulator ??? Simulator ??? Simulator (There will be more fun modes to play in the future) Version At present, it is in the testing stage, and the number of maps and modes is not the final version. The multiplayer mode will be developed soon, and you can play online with your friends soon
